Name: The Gameshow
About the game: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest. Now, surviving is your only objective. Players have to be constantly looking for resources: food, weapons, ammunition, drugs, etc. This is the only way you can gain advantage over the other players. The show goes on until there is only one player surviving, and the survivor is the winner.
Meta Title: The Gameshow: Mar 13, 2019, Biscuit Play and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Gameshow? Check out the release date (Mar 13, 2019), developer insights from Biscuit Play, and a complete game summary.
